about_the_game:
✨ About the Game ✨

Welcome to Element Clicker – the ultimate elemental clicker experience! Dive into a world where every click brings you closer to mastering the elements. 🌟

🧪 Gameplay:
  • Click your way through a vast array of elements!
  • Collect a random element every 3 hours and grow your elemental library.

3-Hour Drop Pool Chances:
  • 🟩 58% Common Element
  • 🟦 34% Uncommon Element
  • 🟨 8% (or exactly 7.999999714285%~) Rare Element
  • 🔴 1/4,000,000 Ultra Rare Element
  • 🟣 1/28,000,000 Legendary Element
Drop rates are subject to change.

🔥 Features 🔥:
  • Elements, naturally – Collect them all!
  • Enhance your collection with unique items.
  • Achievements – Track and celebrate your progress.
  • Join a vibrant community that’s passionately connected by the elements.
  • Design Submissions via Discord! ✨ That’s right! All our elements are crafted with the help of our community. Join us and contribute to the elemental world!

name: element

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 / 11
  • Processor: Intel i5 5500 / AMD Ryzen 5 5600X
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 104 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 / 11
  • Processor: Intel i5 10500 / AMD Ryzen 7+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: ✨ Element Clicker ✨In Element Clicker, you click on elements to gain even more elements! Every 3 hours, you get a new element added to your collection. Each element is crafted by our amazing community on Discord. Come hang out with us and let’s grow into something extraordinary! 🌟
